amendment.description: An amendment numbered 46 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to prohibit the use of funds to implement a TSA vaccine or mask mandate.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
